caption: STANDARDIZED CET1 RATIO (%)
trend_summary: The Standardized CET1 Ratio remained stable at 15.0% between 4Q23 and 1Q24. The ratio was positively impacted by Net income (+78 bps), but this was offset by Capital Distributions (-32 bps), RWA growth (-39 bps), and other factors (-3 bps).

caption: STANDARDIZED RISK-WEIGHTED ASSETS ($B)
trend_summary: Standardized Risk-Weighted Assets increased from $1,672B in 4Q23 to $1,716B in 1Q24. The increase was driven by a $45B rise in Credit Risk ex. Lending and a $7B rise in Market Risk, partially offset by a $9B decrease attributed to Lending.
